contest-event.event-date:
July 6, 2003 D Brass and Trams Entertainment Contest (NEMBBA)
Brass and Trams Entertainment Contest (NEMBBA) 0 Entertainments Contest
brass-and-trams-entertainment-contest-nembba
None
Crich Tramway Museum Contest for 2nd/3rd/4th section bands. Prizes - 1st £250 and trophy, 2nd £175 and trophy, 3rd £100 and trophy. Best section 3 band(£75) - Whitwell. Best section 4 band(£75) - Bakewell. Best soloist Ken Friar (Darley Dale) 11 bands played.
Aug. 19, 2011, 3:54 p.m. Feb. 4, 2017, 11:30 a.m.
1 Carlton Brass Tony Wilson
2 Enderby Youth Band Stewart Osgood
3 Darley Dale Band Sarah Groarke-Booth
6 Long Eaton Silver Prize Band Sharon Stansfield
